Our Mission

We're on a mission to revolutionize how people access premium cannabis—making it safe, fast, and reliable for everyone.

Delivering the Future of Cannabis

We believe that premium cannabis should be as accessible as ordering food delivery. Our mission is to create a seamless, safe, and reliable platform that connects cannabis enthusiasts with the products they love, delivered by people they can trust.

Precision Delivery

Every order is tracked, verified, and delivered with surgical precision.

Community First

We're building more than a service—we're creating a community of responsible cannabis enthusiasts.

Innovation Driven

Cutting-edge technology meets traditional values in every aspect of our platform.

People Powered

Our success comes from the amazing people who choose to work with us and trust us.

Join our mission to revolutionize cannabis delivery

Our Journey

From a bold vision to a growing reality—here's how we're building the future of cannabis delivery.

2024•Q1

The Vision

Founded with a simple mission: make premium cannabis delivery as easy as ordering food.

2024•Q2

Building the Foundation

Assembled our core team and developed the technology platform that powers our operations.

2024•Q3

Driver Network Launch

Recruited and onboarded our first 100 background-checked delivery partners.

2024•Q4

Market Expansion

Launched in our first three cities with plans for rapid expansion across legal markets.

2025•Q1

Community Growth

Reached 500+ early adopters and established partnerships with premium cannabis brands.

2025•Q2

The Future

Expanding to 10+ cities and launching innovative features that will redefine cannabis delivery.

The journey continues • Be part of our story

Our Values

The principles that guide everything we do—from our technology to our team culture.

Safety First

Every delivery is backed by comprehensive safety measures, background-checked drivers, and secure protocols to ensure your peace of mind.

Lightning Fast

We've streamlined the entire experience so you can focus on what matters: actually enjoying your downtime without the wait.

Community Driven

We're building more than a service—we're creating a community of responsible cannabis enthusiasts who value quality and safety.

Premium Quality

Only the finest, lab-tested cannabis products make it to our platform. Quality is non-negotiable in everything we do.

People Powered

Our success comes from the amazing people who choose to work with us and trust us with their cannabis delivery needs.

Excellence

We're committed to delivering excellence in every interaction, from the first order to the thousandth delivery.

Values-driven • Excellence in every delivery

Meet the Team

The passionate people behind ChillNOW—experts in technology, operations, and cannabis who are building the future of delivery.

Alex Chen

Founder & CEO

Former Uber executive with 10+ years in logistics and delivery. Passionate about creating safe, reliable cannabis delivery experiences.

Sarah Rodriguez

Head of Operations

Operations expert with deep experience in regulated industries. Ensures every delivery meets our high standards for safety and quality.

Marcus Johnson

CTO

Tech visionary who built the platform that powers our operations. Former Google engineer with a passion for solving complex logistics challenges.

Dr. Lisa Park

Head of Safety

Former FDA compliance officer with expertise in cannabis regulations. Ensures we meet the highest safety and legal standards.

David Kim

Head of Driver Experience

Former Lyft operations lead who understands what drivers need to succeed. Builds programs that support our delivery partners.

Emma Thompson

Head of Community

Community builder with experience in cannabis advocacy. Creates the connections that make ChillNOW more than just a delivery service.

Passionate team • Building the future together
